x = int(input())
y = 1
while x > 9:
    z = x % 10
    if z > 0:
        y *= z
    x //= 10
print(y * x)

num = int(input())

while num > 9:
    num = str(num)
    num = [int(i) for i in num]
    num = [i for i in num if i != 0]
    num = [str(i) for i in num]
    num = ''.join(num)
    num = int(num)

print(num)

# Read input
x = int(input())

# Find the product of all nonzero digits
while x > 9:
    prod = 1
    for i in range(len(str(x))):
        if str(x)[i] != "0":
            prod *= int(str(x)[i])
    x = prod

# Print output
print(x)
